mapper.select: select pr.pro_code, pr.pro_title, i.iss_title, e.emp_info_name, p.prog_title, s.situ_title from project pr join iss i on (i.iss_pro_code = pr.pro_code) join emp_info e on(i.iss_emp_no = e.emp_info_emp_no) join prog p on (i.iss_prog_code = p.prog_code) join situ s on (i.iss_situ_code = s.situ_code) order by pr.pro_code desc
